description: This file defines API service utilities using axios for REST API communication in a React frontend application. It includes functions for resolving the backend base URL, creating a configured axios instance, interceptors for logging and error handling, and specific functions to send login and registration requests.

methods.name: resolveBaseUrl()
methods.description: Determines the backend API base URL based on environment variables, window location, or fallback default.

methods.name: apiClient
methods.description: Configurable Axios instance used for all API requests, with interceptors for logging and error normalization.

methods.name: login(payload)
methods.description: Sends user login credentials to the '/login' endpoint, returns response data.

methods.name: register(payload)
methods.description: Sends user registration data to the '/register' endpoint, returns response data.
